
name(Pit of Doom)

snap(-5,-6,23)

sky(3,0,32)
fog(55,55,55)
ground(60,30,0)

fadefrom(5000)

nlaps(3)


set(10,0,0,0)p
set(38,0,2500,0)
set(38,0,3000,0)
set(38,0,3500,0)
set(38,0,4000,0)
set(38,0,4500,0)
set(38,0,5000,0)
set(38,0,5500,0)
chk(40,0,6000,0)

set(10,0,5600,0)p
set(26,0,9000,0)pr
set(10,0,12200,0)p
set(10,0,17800,0)p
set(10,0,23400,0)p
set(10,0,29000,0)p
chk(40,0,25000,0)

set(14,0,33550,-90)pt
chk(40,-1500,33550,90)
set(14,-3000,33550,0)pt
set(10,-3000,29500,0)p
set(10,-3000,25000,0)p
set(26,-3000,20000,180)pr
chk(40,-3000,22000,0)
set(10,-3000,20000,0)p
set(10,-3000,15000,0)p
set(10,-3000,10000,0)p
set(30,-3000,10000,0)pr
chk(40,-3000,5000,0)
set(10,-3000,4000,0)p

set(14,-3000,0,180)pt


set(22,-5000,0,270)p
set(22,-5500,0,270)p
set(22,-6000,0,270)p
set(22,-6500,0,270)p
set(22,-7000,0,270)p
set(22,-7500,0,270)p


chk(40,-7000,0,90)
set(14,-9500,0,90)pt
set(10,-9500,4000,0)p
set(10,-9500,6500,0)p
chk(40,-9500,6500,0)
set(32,-8900,8700,0)pr
set(32,-9200,8700,0)pr
set(32,-9500,8700,0)pr
set(32,-9800,8700,0)pr
set(32,-10100,8700,0)pr

set(31,-9500,16000,0)pr
fix(41,-9500,19500,-3000,0)s
set(36,-7500,19000,-90)
set(36,-11500,19000,90)
set(36,-7500,20000,-90)
set(36,-11500,20000,90)
set(36,-7500,21000,-90)
set(36,-11500,21000,90)
set(36,-7500,22000,-90)

set(36,-11500,22000,90)
set(36,-7500,23000,-90)
set(37,-10500,23000,0)
set(37,-9500,23000,0)
set(37,-8500,23000,0)
set(37,-10000,24000,0)
set(37,-9000,24000,0)
set(36,-11500,23000,90)
set(36,-7500,24000,-90)
set(36,-11500,24000,90)
set(36,-7500,25000,-90)
set(36,-11500,25000,90)
set(36,-7500,26000,-90)
set(36,-11500,26000,90)

set(23,-9500,32600,0)p
set(10,-9500,35000,0)p
chk(40,-9500,35000,0)
set(14,-9500,38800,-90)pt
set(22,-11750,38800,90)p
set(14,-14000,38800,0)pt
set(10,-14000,35000,0)p
set(10,-14000,30000,0)p
set(10,-14000,25000,0)p
set(10,-14000,20000,0)p
set(10,-14000,15000,0)p
chk(40,-14000,15000,0)


set(14,-14000,11000,90)pt
set(10,-10000,11000,90)p
chk(40,-10000,11000,90)
set(14,-6000,11000,-90)pt
set(10,-6000,6800,0)p
chk(40,-6000,5500,0)
set(26,-6000,4500,180)pr

set(37,-5950,-8000,0)
set(37,-6150,-8000,0)

set(14,-6000,-7000,180)pt
set(10,-10000,-7000,90)p
chk(40,-10000,-7000,90)
set(14,-14000,-7000,90)pt
set(14,-14000,-4000,0)pt
set(10,-10000,-4000,90)p
chk(40,-11000,-4000,90)
set(26,-10000,-4000,-90)p
set(10,-5000,-4000,90)p
set(22,-2000,-4000,90)p
set(14,0,-4000,180)pt



maxr(10,4000,-6000)
maxb(4,-8400,-12800)
maxt(4,39600,-12800)
maxl(10,-15200,-6000)
